org.forgerock.openam.session.service.access.persistence

Class AbstractInternalSessionStoreStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.session.service.access.persistence.AbstractInternalSessionStoreStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InternalSessionStoreStep
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TimeOutSessionFilterStep

    public abstract class AbstractInternalSessionStoreStep
extends Object
implements InternalSessionStoreStep
    An abstract InternalSessionStoreStep will pass through implementation of the InternalSessionStoreStep interfaces. Extend this to quickly make small filter classes without repeating pass through method implementations.

        public void create(InternalSession session,

            throws SessionPersistenceException
        Description copied from interface: InternalSessionStoreStep
        Stores the InternalSession in the cache. This will also store any associated references which have been stored on the Session:
        • Session ID
        • Session Handle
        • Restricted Tokens
        Specified by:
        create in interface InternalSessionStoreStep
        Parameters:
        session - Non null InternalSession to store.
